Text: Thanks a lot for uploading this! I've been looking for the full soundtrack everywhere. But there's a problem, the Softly Radio track "Hard Life" ends suddenly at 1:36, when it should go for about 2:30 or so, could you fix this please?
thanks for letting me know, ill check it out see what i can do
Thanks buddy! I was looking for music from this game ever since came out and I started to play it ;-) Finally, I do not need to download videos from YouTube and convert them to mp3! Thanks again!

Thanks for the upload.

Looking for Main Theme #4. I noticed some of the tracks are cut short, because probably the song transitions to the random radio chatter in game.

I would say some of the tracks are loud, some are not. May have to equalize with ITunes or something. It's definitely jarring on the iPod when you have earbuds in.

Awesome tracks for crusing and work out.
I only need classical songs from Boosey & Hawkes
